definition: to violate/to offend/to assault/criminal/crime/to make a mistake/recurrence (of mistake or sth bad)
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to know the law and break it (idiom); consciously going against the rules

sentences.english: Policemen have authority to arrest lawbreakers.
Joyce says these McQuillanland authorities are not known for being kind to lawbreakers.
sentences.chinese: 乔伊斯说他们不会善待犯法者。

sentences.english: A ballistics expert were taking evidence at the scene of the crime.
sentences.chinese: 一位弹道学家正在犯法现场提取证据。

sentences.english: They don't think that they're kind to lawbreakers.
sentences.chinese: 他们认为那些官员不会善待犯法者。

sentences.english: Law breakers will be thrown into prison.
sentences.chinese: 犯法者都会被送进监狱。

sentences.english: No matter who breaks the law, he will be punished.
sentences.chinese: 凡犯法者都要受到惩罚。

sentences.english: But if ye have respect to persons, ye commit sin, and are convinced of the law as transgressors.
sentences.chinese: 但你们若按外貌待人，便是犯罪，被律法定为犯法的。

sentences.english: Ignorance of the law is no excuse of breaking it.
sentences.chinese: 不懂法不能成为任何人犯法的借口。

sentences.english: In Alabama it's illegal to have an ice cream cone in your back pocket at all times.
sentences.chinese: 在阿拉巴马州，把一筒雪糕放在裤后袋是犯法的。

sentences.english: Common people abide by the law and behave themselves so that they can avoid external punishment.
sentences.chinese: 一般凡人安份守己的地不犯法，可以免去外刑之灾。

sentences.english: There's no Federal law, no Massachusetts law that criminalizes cannibalism.
sentences.chinese: 没有一部联邦法律或是麻省法律将食人列入犯法的事。

sentences.english: Policemen have authority to arrest law -breakers.
It is against the law in Canada to leave ones kids alone at home.
sentences.chinese: 在加拿大，放小孩子独自在家是犯法的。

sentences.english: Ignorance of the law excuses no man .
sentences.chinese: 不懂法不能成为犯法的借口。

sentences.english: In addition to breaking the law themselves, people tolerate various levels of crime.
sentences.chinese: 人们除了自己会犯法，一般也能容忍程度不同的罪行。

sentences.english: Policemen õ have authority to arrest lawbreakers.

definition: to know the law and break it (idiom); consciously going against the rules
to break the law and violate discipline (idiom)
to break the rules/to break discipline
to break the law/to commit a crime
the law/the law of the land/the law of a state (in former times)/criterion
to offend Heaven and reason (idiom); bloody atrocities that cry to heaven/outrageous acts
